roleset.name: intend to use for some purpose, designation for a specific purpose
roleset.note: DEDICATE-V NOTES: Avoid adjectival usages like"a dedicated lover". (from dedicate.01-v)
DEDICATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, dedicate.01. Corresponds to VNcls dedicate-79. (from dedication.01-n)
DEDICATED-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from dedicated.01-j)

roles.note: Not sure if an arg0 agent can arise with adjectival usage, but it's there for symmetry with verb roleset and doesn't seem strictly impossible. (from dedicated.01-j)
